title: The Bishop's Sacrifice
description: You are a bishop in a critical position. You can sacrifice yourself to create a winning attack, or play safely to maintain material equality. The collective wisdom has analyzed this sacrifice - do you trust their calculation?
background: Bishop sacrifices are among the most beautiful and dangerous moves in chess. The collective wisdom must evaluate complex tactical lines to determine if the sacrifice is sound.

consequences.choiceA: Spectacular sacrifice that may lead to mate or material advantage
consequences.choiceB: Solid move that maintains the position but may miss winning chances

godMove.reasoning: The sacrifice leads to a winning attack in most lines
